what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: goal sysreqs make easy identify R package system dependencies. two components package: “API” wrapper package. API package based rstudio/r-system-requirements API client RStudio Package Manager. functionality inspired [pak::pkg_system_requirements()].

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: package can installed github.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: primary function get_pkg_sysreqs() return named list system dependency identified element named list required system library containing dependencies, recommended pre-installation post-installation commands. function works one package time. seek dependencies multiple packages use get_pkgs_sysreqs(). Additionally, want retrieve json simply parses list without helpers, please use various fetch_*() functions. fetch_systems(): supported operating systems fetch_patterns(): regex patterns identify system dependencies fetch_pkg(): returns package information (name, version, system requirements written DESCRIPTION fetch_rules(): returns rules given system library fetch_pkg_deps(): returns matched system dependencies
code: library(sysreqs)  get_pkg_sysreqs("igraph", os = "ubuntu", "16.04") #> $glpk #> $glpk$dependencies #> [1] "libglpk-dev" #>  #> $glpk$pre_installs #> [1] NA #>  #> $glpk$post_installs #> [1] NA #>  #>  #> $gmp #> $gmp$dependencies #> [1] "libgmp3-dev" #>  #> $gmp$pre_installs #> [1] NA #>  #> $gmp$post_installs #> [1] NA #>  #>  #> $libxml2 #> $libxml2$dependencies #> [1] "libxml2-dev" #>  #> $libxml2$pre_installs #> [1] NA #>  #> $libxml2$post_installs #> [1] NA get_pkgs_sysreqs(   c("rJava", "igraph", "rgdal", "spdep"),   "ubuntu", "16.04" ) #> # A tibble: 8 × 5 #>   pkg    name    dependencies pre_installs post_installs    #>   <chr>  <chr>   <list>       <list>       <chr>            #> 1 rJava  gnumake <chr [1]>    <chr [1]>    <NA>             #> 2 rJava  java    <chr [1]>    <chr [1]>    R CMD javareconf #> 3 igraph glpk    <chr [1]>    <chr [1]>    <NA>             #> 4 igraph gmp     <chr [1]>    <chr [1]>    <NA>             #> 5 igraph libxml2 <chr [1]>    <chr [1]>    <NA>             #> 6 rgdal  gdal    <chr [2]>    <chr [3]>    <NA>             #> 7 rgdal  proj    <chr [1]>    <chr [1]>    <NA>             #> 8 spdep  <NA>    <chr [1]>    <chr [1]>    <NA>

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Access R system dependency data available rstudio/r-system-requirements made available simple plain-text website hosted r-sysdeps.josiahparry.com. sysreq package makes calls url fetch information Contents: patterns used look-table identify system dependencies systems provides list available operating systems (limited linux distributions) /rules directory containing lookup rools system dependencies requirements e.g. rules/gdal.json /pkgs directory containing json files package listing name, version, system dependencies e.g. pkgs/igraph.json
